question: Which nation is associated with the "House of Wangchuk"?
explanation: House of Wangchuk is the ruling family of Bhutan. It was founded in 1907. Ugyen Wangchuk is the founder of this house. This family actually reunified Bhutan after a civil war. They achieved this with the help of favour of the British Indian empire. They are the followers of Vajrayana Buddhism. The current head is Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuk.
